atk-s0511a9:1_0: Sobhitabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ buddhuppādarahitaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a9:1_1: Atīte pana tasmiṁ asaṅkhyeyye ekasmiṁ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṁsu anomadassī, padumo, nāradoti.
atk-s0511a9:1_2: Tattha anomadassī bhagavā soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā devehi abhiyācito tato cavitvā candavatiyaṁ nāma rājadhāniyaṁ yasavā nāmassa rañño kule samussitacārupayodharāya yasodharāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a9:1_3: Anomadassikumāre kira yasodharāya deviyā kucchigate tassa puññappabhāvena pabhā asītihatthappamāṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a9:1_5: Sā dasannaṁ māsānaṁ accayena bodhisattaṁ sucandanuyyāne vijāyi.
atk-s0511a9:2_0: Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa nāmaṁ gaṇhantā, yasmā jātiyaṁ ākāsato satta ratanāni patiṁsu, tasmā anomānaṁ ratanānaṁ uppattihetubhūtattā ‘‘anomadassī’’ti nāmamakaṁsu.
atk-s0511a9:2_1: So anukkamena vuddhippatto dibbehi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāno dasavassasahassāni agāraṁ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a9:2_2: Tassa kira siri upasiri sirivaḍḍhoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a9:2_4: So sirimāya deviyā upavāṇe nāma putte jāte cattāri nimittāni disvā sivikāyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a9:3_0: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso dasa māse padhānacariyaṁ cari.
atk-s0511a9:3_1: Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya anupamabrāhmaṇagāme piṇḍāya caritvā anupamaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṁ madhupāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṁ vītināmetvā anomanāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ajjunarukkhabodhiṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhattiṁsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṁ adhiṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā samāraṁ mārabalaṁ viddhaṁsetvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā –
atk-s0511a9:8_0: ‘‘So chetvā bandhanaṁ sabbaṁ, viddhaṁsetvā tayo bhave;
atk-s0511a9:15_0: Byāharantaṁ giraṁ sutvā, amataṁ pāpuṇanti te’’ti.
atk-s0511a9:16_3: Duratikkamoti duppadhaṁsiyo, aññena devena vā mārena vā kenaci vā atikkamituṁ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
atk-s0511a9:16_4: Sochetvā bandhanaṁ sabbanti sabbaṁ dasavidhaṁ saṁyojanaṁ chinditvā.
atk-s0511a9:16_5: Viddhaṁsetvā tayo bhaveti tibhavūpagaṁ kammaṁ kammakkhayakarañāṇena viddhaṁsetvā, abhāvaṁ katvāti attho.
atk-s0511a9:16_6: Anivattigamanaṁ magganti nivattiyā pavattiyā paṭipakkhabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ anivattīti vuccati, taṁ anivattiṁ gacchati anenāti anivattigamano.
atk-s0511a9:16_7: Taṁ anivattigamanaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_1: Yathā hi samuddo caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro anekayojanasahassabhūtāvāso akkhobhiyo, evaṁ akkhobhiyoti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_2: Ākāsova anantoti yathā pana ākāsassa anto natthi, atha kho ananto appameyyo apāro, evaṁ bhagavāpi buddhaguṇehi ananto appameyyo apāro.
atk-s0511a9:17_4: Sālarājāva phullitoti sabbalakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīrattā suphullitasālarājā viya sobhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_5: Dassanenapi taṁ buddhanti tassa buddhassa dassanenāpīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:17_11: Teti ye tassa giraṁ dhammadesanaṁ suṇanti, te amataṁ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:18_0: Bhagavā pana bodhimūle sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ olokento attanā saha pabbajite tikoṭisaṅkhe jane upanissayasampanne disvā –
atk-s0511a9:18_1: ‘‘kattha nu kho te etarahi viharantī’’ti upadhārento subhavatīnagare sudassanuyyāne viharante disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassanuyyāne otari.
atk-s0511a9:18_2: So tehi parivuto sadevamanussāya parisāya majjhe dhammacakkaṁ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a9:23_0: Athāparena samayena osadhīnagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā asurehi durabhibhavane tāvatiṁsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṁ nisinno temāsaṁ abhidhammavassaṁ vassāpayi.
atk-s0511a9:27_0: Tattha vassanteti buddhamahāmeghe vassante. Dhammavuṭṭhiyoti dhammakathāvassavuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0511a9:28_0: Tato aparena samayena maṅgalapañhāniddese aṭṭhasattati koṭiyo abhisamiṁsu.
atk-s0511a9:32_1: Tappayanteti dhammāmatavassena tappayante, tappanaṁ karonte bhagavatīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:33_1: Tattha soreyyanagare isidattassa rañño dhamme desiyamāne pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ majjhe pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a9:33_3: Rādhavatīnagare sundarindharassa nāma rañño dhamme desiyamāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ sattannaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ majjhe pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a9:33_5: Puna soreyyanagareyeva soreyyaraññā saha ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṁ channaṁ arahantasatasahassānaṁ majjhe pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a9:46_0: Tattha tassāpi ca mahesinoti tassa mahesino anomadassissāpi.
atk-s0511a9:46_3: Abhiññābalappattānanti abhiññānaṁ balappattānaṁ, ciṇṇavasitāya khippanisantibhāvena abhiññāsu thirabhāvappattānanti attho.
atk-s0511a9:47_0: Anaṅgaṇānanti ettha ayaṁ aṅgaṇa-saddo katthaci kilesesu dissati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a9:47_2: Rāgo aṅgaṇaṁ doso aṅgaṇaṁ moho aṅgaṇa’’nti (vibha. 924).
atk-s0511a9:47_3: ‘‘Pāpakānaṁ kho etaṁ, āvuso, akusalānaṁ icchāvacarānaṁ adhivacanaṁ yadidaṁ aṅgaṇa’’nti (ma. ni. 1.60).
atk-s0511a9:47_5: ‘‘tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.184).
atk-s0511a9:47_10: Tapassinanti kilesakkhayakaro ariyamaggasaṅkhāto tapo yesaṁ atthi te tapassino, tesaṁ tapassīnaṁ, khīṇāsavānanti attho.
atk-s0511a9:48_0: Tadā amhākaṁ bodhisatto eko mahesakkho yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṁ yakkhānaṁ adhipati.
atk-s0511a9:48_1: So ‘‘buddho loke uppanno’’ti sutvā āgantvā paramaruciradassanaṁ sattaratanamayaṁ abhirucirarajanikaramaṇḍalasadisaṁ maṇḍapaṁ nimminitvā tattha sattāhaṁ mahādānaṁ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0511a9:48_2: Atha naṁ bhagavā bhattānumodanasamaye ‘‘anāgate kappasatasahassādhike ekasmiṁ asaṅkhyeyye atikkante gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’’ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a9:63_0: Tattha uttariṁ vatamadhiṭṭhāsinti pāramipūraṇatthāya bhiyyopi daḷhataraṁ parakkamamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a9:64_0: Tassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi, yasavā nāma rājā pitā, yasodharā nāma mātā, nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāmupaṭṭhāko, sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā, ajjunarukkho bodhi, sarīraṁ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṁ ahosi, vassasatasahassaṁ āyu, sirimā nāma aggamahesī, upavāṇo nāmassa putto, dasavassasahassāni agāraṁ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a9:64_2: Sivikāyānena gamanaṁ pana sobhitabuddhavaṁsavaṇṇanāya pāsādagamane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a9:79_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a9:84_0: ‘‘So ca satthā amitayaso, yugāni tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a9:86_0: Tattha pabhā niddhāvatīti tassa sarīrato pabhā nikkhamati.
atk-s0511a9:86_1: Sarīrappabhā panassa niccakālaṁ dvādasayojanappamāṇaṁ padesaṁ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0511a9:86_3: Sabbaṁtamantarahitanti vuttappakāraṁ sabbampi aniccamukhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ vinaṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0511a9:86_4: ‘‘Nanu rittakameva saṅkhārā’’tipi pāṭho, tassa nanu rittakā tucchakāyeva sabbe saṅkhārāti attho.
atk-s0511a9:87_0: Imassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato santike sāriputto ca mahāmoggallāno cāti ime dve aggasāvakā aggasāvakabhāvatthāya paṇidhānamakaṁsu.
atk-s0511a9:87_1: Imesaṁ pana therānaṁ vatthu cettha kathetabbaṁ.
